LanguageData.SolarFlare.label: solar flare
LanguageData.SolarFlare.description: A solar flare is hitting the planet. This creates extreme electrical interference and prevents most electrical devices from working.
LanguageData.Eclipse.label: eclipse
LanguageData.Eclipse.description: An eclipse is shadowing the surface. It will be dark, even during the daytime.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.label: psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.description: A distant, powerful AI is emitting waves of psychic force that are driving people towards insanity.
